category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: scheduling_graph_task_legend
preference.preference_description: Used with Schedule Manager resource graphs. Determines whether legends are displayed for stacked bars. If this preference is set to True, the bar tool tip is truncated to show only the task name, schedule name, and date.If this preference is set to False, the bar tool tip is expanded, displaying additional task and assignee information, such as work, capacity, availability, load, and calendar.However, if the scheduling_graph_histogram_single_color preference is set to False, the bar tool tip is truncated even if this preference is set to False. Valid Values: True - Legends are displayed for stacked bars. False - Legends are not displayed for stacked bars.
